attributes.action: create a national holiday devoted to improving relationships in the communtiy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like a national holiday to be devoted to improving relationships in communities.
Ideas to be taken into consideration...

Litter picking: This simple act does not only improve the state of a community, but will prevent danger to young children and wildlife.

Shopping for disabled and elderly: It is often very difficult for disabled or
elderly people to find the time and energy to shop, especially if they are 
living alone and family is scarce. Baking is also an option, and also sends a more personal message.

Visiting hospitals and homes for the elderly/disabled: Spending time with those who reside in homes or who are confined to a hospital environment very much appreciate company, of others than just carers. It gives those concerned a
chance to make new friends.

Cooking and/or providing food: For many, at this time of financial difficulty, getting food on the table is not always easy. Help would be immensely appreciated. 

All of these are easy ways of serving one another and helping to make a difference. We want to make a difference in our communities. We hope you feel the same.
